00017 bool CVideoCapturer::StartCapture(int node)
00018 {
00019     CodecID cid = CODEC_ID_DVVIDEO;
00020     width = 720;
00021     height = 576;
00022     pCodec = avcodec_find_decoder(cid);
00023     if(!pCodec)
00024     {
00025         cerr << "Chyba nalezeni codecu" << endl;
00026         return false;
00027     }
00028 
00029     pCodecCtx = avcodec_alloc_context();
00030     if(!pCodecCtx)
00031     {
00032         cerr << "Chyba alokace kontextu codecu" << endl;
00033         return false;
00034     }
00035     pCodecCtx->codec_id = cid;
00036     pCodecCtx->codec_type = CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO;
00037     pCodecCtx->width = width;
00038         pCodecCtx->height = height;
00039     pCodecCtx->bit_rate = 0;
00040     pCodecCtx->time_base.den = 0;
00041     pCodecCtx->time_base.num = 0;
00042         pCodecCtx->gop_size = 12;
00043     pCodecCtx->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_YUV420P;
00044 
00045     if(avcodec_open(pCodecCtx, pCodec) < 0)
00046     {
00047         cerr << "Chyba otevreni codecu" << endl;
00048         return false;
00049     }
00050 
00051     pFrame = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00052 
00053 
00054     tbmp = create_bitmap_ex(32, width, height);
00055     sws_flags = av_get_int(sws_opts, "sws_flags", NULL);
00056     img_convert_ctx = sws_getCachedContext(img_convert_ctx,
00057         width, height, PIX_FMT_YUV420P,
00058         width, height, PIX_FMT_RGB32, sws_flags, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00059 
00060     if (img_convert_ctx == NULL)
00061     {
00062         cerr << "Chyba inicializace konvert. kontextu" << endl;
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065 
00066     //f = fopen("test.dv", "rb");
00067     raw_handle = raw1394_new_handle_on_port (0);
00068 
00069     if(raw_handle == NULL)
00070     {
00071         cerr << "Chyba inicializace iec61883" << endl;
00072         return false;
00073     }
00074 
00075     raw_frame = iec61883_dv_fb_init (raw_handle, &process_frame, (void *)this );
00076     if (raw_frame && iec61883_dv_fb_start (raw_frame, channel) != 0)
00077     {
00078         cerr << "Chyba inicializace iec61883" << endl;
00079         return false;
00080     }
00081 
00082     return true;
00083 }

00085 int CVideoCapturer::process_frame(unsigned char *data, int len, int complete, void *callback_data)
00086 {
00087     CVideoCapturer *inst = (CVideoCapturer*)callback_data;
00088     if(complete == 0) cout << " nekompletni frame" << endl;
00089     return inst->ProcessFrame(data, len);
00090 }
00091 
00092 int CVideoCapturer::ProcessFrame(uint8_t *data, int len)
00093 {
00094     int got_picture;
00095     avcodec_decode_video(pCodecCtx, pFrame, &got_picture, data, len);
00096     if(got_picture)
00097     {
00098         AVPicture pict;
00099         pict.data[0] = (uint8_t*)tbmp->line[0];
00100         pict.linesize[0] = pCodecCtx->width*4;
00101         sws_scale(img_convert_ctx, pFrame->data, pFrame->linesize,
00102             0, pCodecCtx->height, pict.data, pict.linesize);
00103     }
00104     return 0;
00105 }

00107 void CVideoCapturer::StopCapture()
00108 {
00109     iec61883_dv_fb_close(raw_frame);
00110     raw1394_destroy_handle(raw_handle);
00111     destroy_bitmap(tbmp);
00112     //fclose(f);
00113 }

00115 bool CVideoCapturer::GetNextFrame(BITMAP *bmp)
00116 {
00117     if(bmp == NULL) return false;
00118 
00119 /*
00120 #define FRAME_SIZE 144000
00121     int got_picture;
00122     uint8_t buffer[FRAME_SIZE];
00123     int length;
00124     while(!feof(f))
00125     {
00126         length = fread(buffer, 1, FRAME_SIZE, f);
00127         avcodec_decode_video(pCodecCtx, pFrame, &got_picture, buffer, length);
00128             if(got_picture)
00129             {
00130                 AVPicture pict;
00131                 pict.data[0] = (uint8_t*)bmp->line[0];
00132                 pict.linesize[0] = pCodecCtx->width*4;
00133                 sws_scale(img_convert_ctx, pFrame->data, pFrame->linesize,
00134                     0, pCodecCtx->height, pict.data, pict.linesize);
00135                 return true;
00136             }
00137     }
00138 */
00139     struct pollfd pfd = {
00140         fd: raw1394_get_fd (raw_handle),
00141         events: POLLIN | POLLPRI,
00142         revents: 0
00143     };
00144     int result = 0;
00145 
00146     do {
00147         if (poll (&pfd, 1, 100) > 0 && (pfd.revents & POLLIN))
00148         {
00149             result = raw1394_loop_iterate (raw_handle);
00150             blit(tbmp, bmp, 0, 0, 0, 0, width, height);
00151             return true;
00152         }
00153     } while (result == 0);
00154 
00155     return false;
00156 }
